richTextBody.raw: {"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"During the evening of Friday October 29th 2021, Blankets for T.O. hosted a paint night for our members and students in the UTSC community. The event was held in a campus lecture hall in the Instructional Centre and we decorated the whole place with ghosts and ghouls for the occasion. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"For only a $5 admission ticket, attendees were provided with a wide selection of paints, blank canvases, and brushes that they could use to show off both their breathtaking imagination and artistry. To tie in some nostalgia, we also organized a viewing of Coraline, a creepy 2008 animated classic movie, to fuel the creative juices and dive headfirst into the spooky Halloween spirit. There was an opportunity to also buy some high-quality BTO styled masks and stickers! ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"(Pictured below: BTO Secretary Nivedita Upadhyay (left) and VP Internal Jessika Krzyzewski (right) pose for a photo at the mask and sticker stand. A mysterious individual with a Ghost face mask looms between them. Scary!)","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"1n4qy9dNpuolFDtEzRZxkN","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The event was filled with high energy and fun, with attendees painting all sorts of scary and Halloween-themed images. ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"We gave attendees the chance to compete for a grand prize given for the best painting of the night","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":". Decided by our followers on Instagram (","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"italic"}],"value":"by the way, why don't you follow us over at","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://www.instagram.com/blanketsforto/"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"@blanketsforto","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"?), one member was rewarded the prize for their amazing Coraline-inspired painting. Congrats! ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"The night concluded with attendees getting a chance to model with their masterpieces (one included below!), and all were given the chance to take home a cool polaroid to remember the evening. ","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"},{"data":{"target":{"sys":{"id":"7EGpFM7EXKaWLnOOjotRc0","type":"Link","linkType":"Asset"}}},"content":[],"nodeType":"embedded-asset-block"},{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"If you missed out on our spooky Halloween paint night,","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[{"type":"bold"}],"value":"don’t worry!","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":" Blankets for T.O. has tons of future events planned for our members and UTSC students - be sure to follow us on social media, and subscribe to our email list, to keep up to date with everything we’re up to! ","nodeType":"text"},{"data":{"uri":"https://blanketsforto.ca/contact"},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"See our socials and contact links here","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"hyperlink"},{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":".","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

childMarkdownRemark.html: In the afternoon of Friday October 29th 2021, Blankets for T.O. hosted a paint night for our members and students in the UTSC community.
